messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Chaplain is a ling and is breakign into the vault

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Solar Array.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I just dealt with a malf ai and kileda ling, i am a hero
